name: Nari
dialog: P_name, hi! It's me, Nari! Can you come out for a moment?

name: 주인공
dialog: Sure, come on in, Nari! What's up?

name: Nari
dialog: Our mom and dad live in Acorn Village. I want to show Acorn Village to P_name. Would you like to come with me tomorrow to Acorn Village?

name: 주인공
dialog: Sure, but is Acorn Village close to Hope Island?

name: Nari
dialog: No, it's a bit far. That's why we have to take a boat to get there.

name: 주인공
dialog: We're going on a boat? Wow, that sounds exciting!

name: Nari
dialog: Alright, P_name! Let's meet at the harbor tomorrow!

name: 주인공
dialog: Sure thing, Nari! See you tomorrow.

name: Nari
dialog: P_name, you're here. Let's go to catch the boat to Acorn Village.

name: 주인공
dialog: P_name, you're here. Let's go to catch the boat to Acorn Village.

name: Kang Tae Gom
dialog: Hello! P_name and Nari. Where are you going?
비고: 주인공과 나리 선착장으로 이동하는 중 강태곰 만남.

name: Kang Tae Gom
dialog: Isn't Acorn Village where Nari's family lives? In that case, you just need to take this boat. I'll safely take you there by boat.

name: Kang Tae Gom
dialog: Alright, now that everyone is on board, let's set sail for Acorn Village! Woosh~!

name: Kang Tae Gom
dialog: Alright, now that everyone is on board, let's set sail for Acorn Village! Woosh~!
